docs.lead_paragraph: ChemChina [CNNCC.UL] is set to secure conditional EU antitrust approval for its $43 billion (34 billion pound) bid for Swiss pesticides and seeds group Syngenta, the largest foreign acquisition by a Chinese company, two people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
